content:encoded:
This time on Case Closed, Night Beat brings us our first story with their episode from May 8, 1950, titled, The Elevator Caper.

(31:42) Sherlock Holmes closes out this week’s episode with The Fifth Of November, their broadcast from November 5, 1945.

Download CaseClosed749

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’d like to help out, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
